Somerville.Edward Dodge House (Cambridge, Massachus: The Edward Dodge House is a historic house at 70 Sparks Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1878 to a design by Longfellow and Clark. It has asymmetrical massing typical of Queen Anne styling, and also has a style of half-timbering on its upper levels that was popular in England in the 1860s.
